Declare @vchSQL nvarchar(max) Declare @bigsql nvarchar(max)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[fn_IsCriteriaIncludedIntoPoolFunction]'') AND type in (N''FN'', N''IF'', N''TF'', N''FS'', N''FT'')) DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_IsCriteriaIncludedIntoPoolFunction] ' exec (@vchSQL)
--************************************************** --fn_IsCriteriaIncludedIntoPoolFunction --************************************************** Set @vchSQL ='CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_IsCriteriaIncludedIntoPoolFunction] ( -- Add the parameters for the function here @PoolFunctionName nvarchar(200), @CriteriaSetId bigint, @CriteriaName nvarchar(200) ) RETURNS bit AS BEGIN
-- Add the T-SQL statements to compute the return value here declare @IsIncluded bit
If exists (select 1 from tblPoolFunctionToECMapping where PoolFunctionName = PoolFunctionName and CriteriaSetId = CriteriaSetId and CriteriaName = @CriteriaName) set @IsIncluded = 1 else set @IsIncluded = 0
-- Return the result of the function RETURN @IsIncluded
END ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
